wikipedia_page.main: John David Cash  (3 April 1936 – 8 December 2020) was president of the Royal College of Physicians of Edinburgh. He also served as Medical Director at the Scottish National Blood Transfusion Service from 1979 to 1988.

response: *John Cash (physician) (1936–2020), former president of the Royal College of Physicians of Edinburgh
*John Cash, 84, Scottish physician, President of the Royal College of Physicians of Edinburgh (1994–1997).In Memoriam - Professor John Cash CBE
